title: Afghanistan: Shukria Barakzai's whispered voice notes and dramatic escape
description: The desperate messages sent by Afghan politician Shukria Barakzai to a UK MP as the Taliban tried to hunt her down.

title: Afghanistan: 'I helped the US military, now help me save my family'
description: Afghans living in Texas plead for help to save the lives of loved ones left behind in Afghanistan.

title: Cristiano Ronaldo: His greatest Premier League moments
description: BBC Sport takes a look back at some of Cristiano Ronaldo's greatest Premier League moments.
